title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, February 13, 2020
description: To get you in the mood for Valentine’s Day, today we feature love stories from fiction and history, from John & Abigail Adams to Romeo & Juliet.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: To get you in the mood for Valentine’s Day, today we feature love stories from fiction and history, from John & Abigail Adams to Romeo & Juliet.
